page.title: 06SQUARE 5
page.content:
{
IN THIS SQUARE THERE IS MORE VARIETY,FIRST OF ALL THERE AN OLD HOUSE,THAT IS BEING RENIVATED.THE HOUSE IS GOING TO BE A SPORTS CLUB. THERE IS ALSO A GOLF COURSE THAT TAKES UP NEARLY ALL OF THE SQUARE.THE GOLF COURSE IS ADJACENT TO THE A50.THIS ROAD IS ONE OF THE MAIN ROADS TO BURTON UPON TRENT,ALONG THIS ROAD THERE HAS BEEN BUILT A NEW CAFE. ALSO THERE IS A CREMATORIUM AND ALONG THE A50 THERE IS AN HOTEL NAMED THE STANHOPE ARMS WHICH IS NEAR THE ENTRANCE TO AN ABANDONED RAILWAY.THERE IS ALSO A LITTLE CHAPEL AND A GARAGE THAT SELLS CARS AND PETROL.
